meanings.definition: A substance used to repel something, especially insects or animals.
meanings.sent1: I sprayed some repellents to keep the mosquitoes away.
meanings.sent2: The store sells various repellents to keep bugs out of the house.
meanings.sent3: The picnic was saved by the timely application of repellents.
meanings.sent4: Her jokes acted as repellents, keeping unwanted attention at bay.
meanings.sent5: The repellents created an invisible shield against pesky pests.

meanings.definition: Tending to drive away or keep at a distance.
meanings.sent1: The strong smell of the repellents made the room unpleasant.
meanings.sent2: His cold demeanor had a repellents effect on those around him.
meanings.sent3: The repellents attitude of the cat towards the dog was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The dark clouds had a repellents effect on the tourists, sending them indoors.
meanings.sent5: The repellents force of her words made him rethink his actions.
